column4: im downloading updates at 19kbs, is this the average speed :/ ?
ok thanks
oh ok
guys i need help, I have a white box, with no title or icons, in the center of my screen, which is annoying and i can't remove. How can I remove/fix this?
you could find the process causing it using "top" perhaps, and then use the Kill command in top
top ???
it'll take a little trial and error to find it probably

learn the "top" command using a terminal.  type "top", then when the program is up, type "u" and then your user name for processes under your user name, then use the "k" (kill) command and type the number of the process you think it might be.  Either that or perhaps there's a kill function in the menu somewhere for that white window.
does the white window come up every time it boots?
well when I rebooted, it came up after i selected update manager
i see..hmmm   do you think update-manager is hung up or something?
it does not appear at startup right away
not sure man ><
also, when that happens i see characters in the background
big characters
well, I guess do a little digging with top and other system monitors, and maybe you can find out what program is causing it and then kill it and then disable it somehow.  Other than that I'm clueless
good luck
this problem started appearing right after i installed th plugin-fix for flash and stuff
thanks -_-
i see, I'll think about that.  It could be a flash malfunction eh?
u wont believe this, when i disabled visuall effects, all is ok now
wierd
its definitly something related to compiz...
excellent, well you are on your way to finding out what it is hopefully.  I usually find stuff like that only by stumbling along and finding things by accident.
